QuestData.Title: The Warlord's Ashes
QuestData.Description: <Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver defeated Warlord Gurthan centuries ago, but the mogu beastmaster's spirit continues to haunt the ruins of his old stronghold.$B$BShowing proof of your victory over this spirit may gain you favor in the eyes of the Klaxxi.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Ashes of Warlord Gurthan to Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver at Klaxxi'vess.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Ashes of Warlord Gurthan to Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver at Klaxxi'vess.
